EmailTemplate.name: SEVT-202305-HHS-ENT-AONL-CONF.02a. Follow-Up-Attended_List.from.iCapture
EmailTemplate.subject: Thanks for connecting with us at AONL 2023
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Thank you for making the time to connect with us Let's keep the conversation going. If you haven’t had a chance yet, we invite you to explore our virtual nursing resources <[[https://business.teladochealth.com/virtual-nursing/]]>. You’ll find a wealth of information about the practice of virtual nursing, an overview of its benefits and emerging use cases and guidance on introducing the practice in a way that fosters adoption and acceptance among staff. About Teladoc Health: Teladoc Health is transforming the healthcare experience and empowering people everywhere to live healthier lives. Recognized as the world leader in whole-person virtual care, Teladoc Health leverages more than a decade of expertise and data-driven insights to meet the growing virtual care needs of consumers and healthcare professionals. All rights reserved. 2 Manhattanville Road, Purchase NY, 10577.
